scripts.test: npm run test:clean && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
